posts.post_title: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut plug baseball cards for sale!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave's Vintage Baseball Cards
I have just listed up 30 N300 Mayo Cut plug baseball cards for sale, and will list some more later.
Images are up on the site along with prices.

You can take a look directly at:  [URL="https://www.gfg.com/baseball/mayo.shtml"]Mayo Baseball Cards[/URL]

All of the cards are graded ranging from 1 to 5.

Thanks

Dave
